app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2079-6382/10/2/166/s1 Figure S1: Mass spectra of three major thionins from Nigella sativa seeds: NsW1 (A); NsW2 (B); NsW4 (C). Figure S2: Purity control of NsW1, NsW2 and NsW4 (Cromatographic profiles after analytical RP-HPLC on Phenomenex Luna C18 100×2; 3 µm; 100 Å). Figure S3: Phylogenetic tree of plant thionins based on amino acid alignment. Figure S4: Heterochromatin condensation in human buccal epithelial cells after treatment with NsW2.
